title: Zoologist
summaries: The Zoologist is an NPC vendor that sells animal-related items and vanity. She will move in when the following criteria have been met:

• There is an empty house.
  • The Bestiary has been filled to at least 10% (54 entries).

She sells a large variety of <linked>vanity items</linked>, in addition to many <linked>mounts</linked> and <linked>pets</linked>, critter-themed <linked>accessories</linked>, and the <linked>Universal Pylon</linked>, depending on the Bestiary's completion percentage.
The Zoologist will attack nearby enemies with her claws to defend herself.
